text: Nargedia is a genus of plant in the family Rubiaceae.Remarks on three Hypobathreae (Rubiaceae) from Rodrigues, Seychelles and Sri Lanka. Deva D. Tirvengadum and Elmar Robbrecht, Nordic Journal of Botany, December 1985, Volume 5, Issue 5, pages 455–461, It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Nargedia macrocarpa, (Thwaites) Beddome == References == Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxa named by Richard Henry Beddome Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nargedia
